original_text: Pharaoh was very pleased with Hadad, so he gave Hadad a wife. She was the sister of his own wife, Queen Tahpenes.
korean_text: 하닷이 바로의 눈 앞에 크게 은총을 얻었으므로 바로가 자기의 처제 곧 왕비 다브네스의 아우를 그의 아내로 삼으매

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh was very pleased with Hadad
so he gave Hadad a wife
She was the sister of his own wife
